attributes.action: Allow freepost to all personnel on active deployment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Current Freepost does not cover all the Troops on active service....There are many Navy ships on deployment who do not benefit from this service and there are many other area's where Personnel are deployed for months at a time who would benefit from the post being made free for them also.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Allow freepost to all personnel on active deployment."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16842


Prime Minister's Office
